scripts.server: yarn workspace @cuppazee/functions lint && yarn workspace @cuppazee/functions build && firebase serve
scripts.deploy-web: yarn workspace @cuppazee/app build-web && firebase deploy --only hosting:app
scripts.deploy-app: yarn workspace @cuppazee/app deploy-app && yarn workspace @cuppazee/app build-web && firebase deploy --only hosting:app
scripts.deploy-all: yarn workspace @cuppazee/app build-web && firebase deploy --only hosting && yarn workspace @cuppazee/app deploy-app && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.postinstall: yarn licenses list --json -s | node tail > packages/app/assets/dependencies.json && node copy ./packages/types ./packages/app/node_modules/@cuppazee/types
scripts.publish-types: yarn workspace @cuppazee/types build && yarn workspace @cuppazee/types publish && yarn workspace @cuppazee/app add @cuppazee/types && yarn workspace @cuppazee/server add @cuppazee/types && yarn install
scripts.install-types: yarn workspace @cuppazee/app add @cuppazee/types && yarn workspace @cuppazee/server add @cuppazee/types && yarn install
